reasoning output optimized, to understand better + debug purposes + PvE : Rejuvenation priority on AoE Situations increased above Regrowth + PvE : Rejuvenation double entry in priority list removed.. one of our selves + PvE : UseWildGrowth now includes the usage of Synapse Springs + PvE : Priority of Incarnation increased to -> Incarnation -> WM Bloom -> NAture's Swiftness + PvE : Priority of Nature's Vigil increased to increase our Healing per Second + PvE : Priority of Swiftmend split, high priority when we don't have harmony.. + PvE : Priority of Force of Nature is increased, it's off the GCD.. so we don't care biatch + PvE : Priority of Soul of the Forest is increased, to align better with Tranquility + PvE : Priority of Mark of the Wild is increased, we want that shit right.. always + PvE : Swiftmend core re-prioritized for best throughput Efflorence > Single Target ( ALWAYS ) + PvE : Lifebloom uptime no longer checks Woosh... used 3.45% of load. We use Cached Can Heal Now + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode optimized, no longer waste swiftmend on the tanks + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode optimized, no longer uses Nourish if the user disable it + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode no longer uses redundant aura time checks + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode now uses NourishTarget instead of HealTarget, might aswell snoop bit extra hps + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode now included nourish on tank to refresh lifebloom also + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode now checks mana before it uses regrowth on the tanks + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode tank health check increased from 75 to 85 % + PvE : KeepHarmonyCode will trigger on 1 second instead of 1.5 seconds now + PvE : Swiftmend now has a higher priority then clearcasting... we want SM on CD + PvE : PvEShapeshift composite added, easier coding on PvE code. + PvE : PvEShapeshift now includes Travel Form.. because it's better d'uh. + PvE : PvEShapeshift now checks if we can cast Travel form, else uses cat form + PvE : PvEShapeshift no longer checks if we are moving .. just root/slow/snare + PvE : PvEShapeshift will now enter Cat form if we are falling + PvE : PvEShapeshift will now check if we have Grace glyph, else go cat dude ( Falling ofcourse ) + PvE : PvEShapeshift will now re-enter Incarnation if we have the buff but not in the form + PvE : PvEDispellEngine will not dispel root/slow/snare on ourselves anymore + PvE : Raid.StopCasting made universal Dungeon, Scenario use it too now + PvE : StopCasting Nature's Swiftness now checks if we arn't already casting on the current unit + PvE : StopCasting will no longer cancel for Swiftmend.. Single Target SM is low HPS... + PvE : Stopcasting now checks if the last cast is Nourish.. so it no longer cancels ur own cast + PvE : StopCasting will no longer cancel Tranquility for Nature's Swiftness + PvE : Clearcasting will only be used if the aura lasts longer then regrowth cast time + PvE : Clearcasting cancel will be used earlier... e.g. clearcasting ends before cast ends + PvE : Clearcasting code cleaned up, no longer says Clarity.. says Clearcasting.. causing lagspikes + All : Fixed Swiftmend, will now cast instantly and not bug out on current target shit + All : Generated new Presets ( Out of my Head, untested -> Upon request ) + PvP : Starting on error spam + All : Will now scan best unit for Swiftmend and wild growth before it comes of cooldown to cast faster. + PvE : Soul of the Forest Rotation rewritten to EJ's Post . Might be worse result to the custom one we had before + All : Attempt to fix the 299 Errors + All : Compiled for official Honorbuddy release + PvE : Fixed Nourish skipping the health check + PvE : Fixed the Mushroom spam when it was toggled off + PvE : RE-enabled Raid SUpport on Raid Context, + PvE : added 25M Heroic Settings + ALl : Changed the spell log output, to only log when the cast is succesfull to avoid confusion + All : Fixed the Efficiency Hotkey not registering properly. + PvE : Will now only Heal/Hot out of combat on the tank if he has an enemy target and is moving + PvE : Fixed Auto Mushroom setting, should be se to false on default + All : Fixed Interrupt bug + All : Compiled for HonorbuddyBETA 2.5.7089.246. + PvE : Swiftmend settings changed, will now have both Single Target and Cluster health checks. + PvE : Swiftmend Unit checks optimized to pick bigger clusters and not only +4 etc + PvE : SotF Rotation rewritten to use the new SequenceCast , no longer get unaligned CASTS! + PvE : Fixed lifebloom stacking + PvE : SotF will now Prioritize Swiftmend -> Tranquility over Swiftmend -> Wild Growth when u don't use 4 Piece T14 + PvE : Increased priority of Nature's Swiftness above Force of Nature + All : Fixed bug where it wouldn't scan Treeoflife targets when ur not in Tree form + All : Fixed the TalentManager reporting wrong talents + All : Default Heal Style is set to Predict to be more mana efficient + All : Fixed Lifebloom spam on self when we can't cast it on tank + All : Changed the code for Force of Nature + All : Fixed the combatlog so we can work on Mushrooms + Both : Optimized GetAllRoles for Dpss. + All : Seperated all rotations to be more specific + PvE : Added support for new Force of Nature Talent + PvE : Cenarion Support as a Filler to keep buff up + PvE : Automatic usage of Mushrooms implemented (Beta) + All : Implemented new Sequence handler for Chaincasting + All : Huge speed optimization on all checks + PvE : Optimized the Healing Priority to be more lifelike + PvE : Extended the Healing Priority checks to be more precise + PvE : Changed the way we handle Cooldowns, they're no longer all on top but reworked into the rotation for a more lifelike handling + PvE : Will now cast Wild Growth -> Tranquility in that order for more healing output + All : Duo the nature of Leaves (CC) It's not viable to have Healing Touch and unnecessary spells coded in. Those are now disabled because the cc is made for level 90 + + PvE : Added Hurricane Support for Hearth of the Wild + All : Fixed the usage of Tranquility + All : Decreased the ammount of settings, most things don't need to be changed. Only cause confusion + PvE : Added support for the Legendary Meta Gem + All : Added additional code for Barkskin, better handling + All : Will now Correctly use Might of Ursoc -> go back Tree form + PvE : Tweaked Scenario rotation / priority + PvE : Removed redundant casts + PvE : Fixed the lifebloom swap not working when u have more then1 stack + PvE : Stopcasting will now always return Runstatus.Succes, decreasing the amount of checks executed within a small amount of time + PvE : Stopcasting optimized, by re-ordering checks from Fast -> Slow to increase efficiency + PvE : Stopcasting entries decreased, made some globally and reduced amount of checks + PvE : Fixed it not cancelling overheals on Dps and Healers, it checked only on tanks. + PvE : Removed the Regrowth Clearcasting cancel, causes healing delay. + PvE : Will no longer cancel tranquility when it is overhealing ! URGENT CHANGE! + PvE : Changed the way we check for SpiritWalker's ( Symbiosis ) + PvE : Fixed a bug of Shouldnotcast not returning true to the pause, causing it to scan multiple times + PvE : Re-ordered Pause checks to Fast -> Slow checks for efficiency + All : Healing prediction now does not account for our own hots, we want more HPS SNIPE THAT HEAL.. we run with 15k Spirit anyway + All : Updated PredictedHealth Offsets # Credits Singular + All : Fixed the routine blowing cooldowns on units that don't exist, nulls/ errors etc. + All : Fixed the usage of Symbiosis Spells + All : Made CastonGround more failsafe + All : Updated TalentManager to reflect new 5.3 changes, all credits to singular + All : When refreshing healable we check CanCast(Rejuvenation) on them instead of inlineof sight. Validating our targets the Vuhdo Style. + All : Implemented auto context detection for Arena/Battleground/Raid/Scenario.. if not found defaults to raid + All : Added a race check for Berserking + PvP : Escaping cooldowns are now disabled when u disable Automatic Mode + All : Changed all the sequence code to take into account lag + All : Fixed CastManager mehtods being decorators instead of a composite + All : Fixed Rejuvenation Checks where it would check for all and not only ours + All : Fixed Regrowth Checks where it would check for all and not only ours + All : Fixed Moonfire Checks where it would check for all and not only ours + All : Changed the way our Shapeshift composite handles our shape + PvP : When holding the damage hotkey, the routine will now Interrupt and dispell too. + PvP : Will now properly detect if we are in Tree of Life form and place lifebloom on all units faster + All : Compiled on Beta build 244. + All : Added BestMushroomTarget to Healable Units + All : Added BestForceofNatureTarget to Healable Units + All : Implemented Force of nature in the rotation + All : Nature's Swiftness will now only be used when automatic mode is active + All : Force of Nature will now only be used when automatic mode is active + PvE : Removed reduntant checks on Tanks Target + PvE : Spiritwalker support for Wrath filler + All : REmoved auto context, switching rotations in GUI is way better. + PvE : TreeofLife with multiple druids will no longer bug out on lifebloom filler + PvE : Lowered the priority of lifebloom rolling to have more hps output + PvE : Fixed cancelcasts for swiftmends on target who we cannot swiftmend etc. + All : Tank/Healer/Dps Checks now check for GUID instead of whole unit, faster. + All : Re-ordered Safe name entries so it will properly return "Boss" + PvE : Soul of the Forest fix for Rejuvenation, mistaken a true/false check. + PvE : Added a option to rejuvenate on Dots , pre-emptive healing + PvP : Will no longer cancelcast for Nature's Swiftness if u don't have that talent. + Both : Health % returned when a unit is null is upped from 0% to 100% to stop it from blowing cooldowns on 0 units + PvE : Fixed dispelling where there was a range req, Mageara, Jin'rokh, Dark Animus + PvE : Changed 90% of the dispel checks to only check for debuffs + Both : Removed the Global Throttle + Both : Pulse Targets only if we can actually cast anything + Both : StopCasting enhanced to support latency + Both : Sequences optimized + Both : Check cleanup. + Both : Decreased time spent checking for lineofsight, Dottraced + Both : Wild Growth & Swiftmend Checks have their radius changed to support 5.3 + PvE : Changed our LoS checks + PvE : Changed Corrupted Healing check to check for all units instead of only tanks. + PvE : Settings for minimum units to be in efflorence + Both : Healing priorities have been slightly altered. + PvP : removed all overhead on GetHealTarget, should be faster now + Both : Fixed debug output for GetHealTarget + PvP : Interrupt scan has been optimized to interrupt more. + PvE : Rewrote our Swiftmend method - Both : - Removed Wild GRowth & Swiftmend Debug information from Debug GUI + Both : Fixed a bug with Throttle Time, if set to 0 or lower it would not Swiftmend/Wild GRwth + Both : Changed InlineofSpellSight checks to use CanCast(Rejuvenation). - Both : - Removed Wild Growth debugging - Both : + Compiled on latest Honorbuddy version - PvE : + Nourish + Rejuvenation Synergy optimized + Both : Changed Wild Growth unit scan to be more efficient + Both : Talent Scan for Nature's Swiftness + Healing Touch on cancel entry + Added settings for Harmony Casting + PvE : Will no longer use items when not in combat + PvP : Tree of life will nolonger cast Rejuv on a target whom already has it + PvP & PvE : Support for Regrowth Unglyphed has been enhanced. + PvP : Lifebloomtarget has been optimized, more uptime on ourselves + PvP : Set values for Rejuvenation have been edited, will properly detect their roles + PvP : Rejuvenation will no longer double cast + PvP : Rejuvenation Clipping has been moved up the priority and added a moving check + PvP : Cenariond Ward priority is now higher + PvP : Nature's Swiftness + healing Touch priority is now higher, but still under Single Target Swiftmend. + PvE : Twin Consorts support for Corrupted Healing has been enhanced. + PvE : Pink Dinosaur safe range has been decreased from 25 yd to 17 yd, so u can heal more. + PvE : Tortos HC support for Humming Crystal has been added. + PvE : Faerie Swarm on Turtles on Tortos has been enhanced but only active on Heroic Modes, normal mode dps will slow 90% off the time. + PvE : Fixed bug where it tried to cast Stampeding Roar on a enemy unit instead of self.
